actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for a joint session of the two Houses on Tuesday, April 28, 1981, to receive a message from the president of the United States.

summary.text: Provides for a joint session of the Congress on April 28, 1981, to receive a communication from the President.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a joint session of the two Houses on Tuesday, April 28, 1981, to receive a message from the president of the United States.
